::KitKat::

She looked at Stringtra, "He'll do nothing of the sort.  If he tried, 
I'll tie him to a chair and make him sit there until he promises not 
to go out for revenge."

She looked at Wildfire. "He's my commander! Sure he looks a little 
odd, but who doesn't around here.  He's just fine.  And if you say 
one more bad word about him," she growled a deep, loud growl," I'll 
SLAG you! GOT IT!"

She was in no mood to have a new bot in the group badmouth her friend 
and commander.
